targets.expr:
((ceph_pool_max_avail / deriv(ceph_pool_stored[7d])) * on(pool_id) group_left(instance,name) ceph_pool_metadata{})
 + on(pool_id) group_left(instance,name)
topk(3,((ceph_pool_stored / (ceph_pool_stored + ceph_pool_max_avail)) * on(pool_id) group_left(name) ceph_pool_metadata)) > 0

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "실행" as id
  ,count(*) as Value
FROM vm_instance
WHERE
  removed is null
  and state = "Running"
  and vm_type = "User"

SELECT
  "정지" as id
  ,count(*) as Value
FROM vm_instance
WHERE
  removed is null
  and state = "Stopped"
  and vm_type = "User"

SELECT
  "기타" as id
  ,count(*) as Value
FROM vm_instance
WHERE
  removed is null
  and state not in ("Running","Stopped") 
  and vm_type = "User"

targets.expr: topk(1, rate(libvirt_domain_info_cpu_time_seconds_total{domain=~"i-.*"}[1m]) / on (domain, instance) count(libvirt_domain_vcpu_cpu{}) by (instance, domain) * 100)

list.definition:
SELECT
	GROUP_CONCAT(private_ip_address SEPARATOR '|')
FROM host
WHERE
	removed IS NULL
	AND type = "Routing"
list.name: hostips
list.query:
SELECT
	GROUP_CONCAT(private_ip_address SEPARATOR '|')
FROM host
WHERE
	removed IS NULL
	AND type = "Routing"

list.definition:
SELECT
	CONCAT(GROUP_CONCAT(private_ip_address SEPARATOR ':9090|'),':9090')
FROM host
WHERE
	removed IS NULL
	AND type = "Routing"
list.name: cubeips
list.query:
SELECT
	CONCAT(GROUP_CONCAT(private_ip_address SEPARATOR ':9090|'),':9090')
FROM host
WHERE
	removed IS NULL
	AND type = "Routing"
